Meanwhile, Aries soon made his way up a hill and found out where
Dracon had ordered him to go.

Aries: By all the corpses I've devoured! You brought me in the defense
perimeter of that base! What went on in your mind?

Leo wanted to have a word. The bot transformed and the feline head
took the lead.

Leo: No! We doesn't want to go there! Bad place! Not for usses! We no
like Dracon, stupid beasts!

Dracon roared and the dragon head suddenly came to life.

Dracon: Silence, you pathetic critter! When I say we go there, we go
there!

Leo cowered back in place, but was still not very confident about what
to do.

Leo: Ssssstop it! We goes for now... don't shout no more, pleasssssse!

He slowly walked nearer to the base, but he didn't know quite qhat to
do then.

Leo: Happy, now, Dracon? Those bad-eyed machines see usses now... We
no enemies, nice machineses...
